author: greystroke
content: Are the encrypted mempools being researched similar to the shutterized mempool implemented on Gnosis?

author: gibson.ether
content: Shutter has been developing and implementing encrypted mempool technology utilizing threshold encryption. This technology has already been tested and is currently live on the Gnosis Chain. Now, we are moving towards integration with Ethereum Layer 1

author: greystroke
content: Would be great to see it in after ePBS & FOCiL (ideally both happen in Glamsterdam). They all would seem to complement each other well. Shorter slot times & Encrypted mempools togetherwould both be a huge UX improvement for H- fork to follow.
